name: Eureka
description: Eureka is the place where developers come to get inspiration to build. It is a collection of 100,000+ ideas from developers of all backgrounds.

name: Network Intrusion Detection System (NIDS)
description: A machine learning based NIDS for detecting abmornal network traffic. It beats traditional approaches like Snort by 6%.

name: FilmFindr
description: A platform where users come to find the next movie or show to watch.
